definitions.title: pl.
definitions.body: chequered (or plaited) work, usu. of settings for gems;—[[חׇהָב]] ´[[מ]]: (i.e. plaited with gold-thread) for two gems on high priest’s ephod (P): Ex 28:11, Ex 28:13, Ex 39:6, Ex 39:13, Ex 39:16; ´[[מ]]: abs. Ex 28:14, Ex 28:25, Ex 28:39, Ex 39:18; [[לְבוּשָׁהּ]] ´[[ז]] :´[[מִמּ]]: Ps 45:14 her clothing is of chequer work in wrought with gold; < Krochm Gr Che:comm. ´[[פְּנִינִים בְּמִשְׁבְּחוֹת ז]]: [[לְבוּשָׁהּ]] (v. [[פְּנִימָה]] p. 819 supr.) pearls in plaited settings of gold (-thread).
